alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 1:42PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Developing and scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Otero, western and central Kiowa and northwestern Bent Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 138 PM MDT, scattered thunderstorms continue developing from northern Otero and Bent Counties north-northeastward into central Kiowa County. Movement of this band of activity is only slowly eastward at around 10 to 15 mph, but individual storms within the band are moving north-northeastward 30 to 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar and satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations potentially impacted include... Eads, Cheraw, Haswell, Blue Lake, Arlington, Hasty and John Martin Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong winds could extend well away from precipitation and lightning cores.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
